description: The Sennheiser CX 400-B is a high quality, noise isolating in-ear headphone with powerful, bass-driven stereo sound for listening on the go. They feature a short cable, perfect for use with armband MP3 players or with a remote-control. With the included 3-foot extension cable the CX 400-B can also be used with a player carried in your pocket.
title: Sennheiser CX 400-B Lightweight In-Ear Stereo Headphone (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
